ValidationRule.description: SS: Rule place to control PSG Alts Accounts, which is only allowed by PSG ALT group and they should not able to edit other Account Types.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND ($Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', OR ( AND ($Profile.Name <> 'PSG ALTS',PSG_Alts_Accounts__c = TRUE), AND ($Profile.Name = 'PSG ALTS',PSG_Alts_Accounts__c = FALSE)) ) , TRUE, FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You DO NOT have the privilege to modify it. Please contact your Administrator for further details.
